Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights son graduated boot camp december 2011 werent 5 star didnt california sit hotel called reservations gentleman money saving suggestions staff helpful restaurants cabs hotel walking distance town san fell love definitely stay againjust location service staff

Reviews.Content: stayed western inn town san diego week referred hotel friend aware conveniences smoothly stay hotel proved surprise visit san diego comfortable facilities price excellent location properly timely treatment staff plus highly reccomend hotel plan stay visit

Reviews.Title: “Limited but clean, conveniently located and good service”
Reviews.Author: Clare C
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights 2 week journey california found hotel easy booked expedia decent rate type hotel check gentleman offered upgrade slightly larger microwave refrigerator 10 convenient heat milk 8 month son store groceries husband speed internet clean comfortable street quiet 1 block interstate everytime walked lobby promptly greeting desk clerk genuine smile ready assist helpful information fresh coffee juice sweet rolls visit

Reviews.Title: “Location, Service, Price and WiFi”
Reviews.Author: drtinku1224
Reviews.Content: looking sleep rest heading sea world hotel proved located freeway exits sea world walking distance town minutes gas lamp district marina etc fairly priced clean decor bit dated eyesore pleasant surprises wifi fast free sanjay knowledgeable nearby sites hospitable park structure 6 dollars nearby street parking fee ran staff friendly highly recommend couples family dont plan stay hotel day stay free breakfast plus loved san diego stay western inn thanks sanjay trip comfortable memorable

Reviews.Author: Ode2travel
Reviews.Content: hotels convenience town biggest plus price bad comfortable nofrills hotel kingsize bed comfortable fitted sheets didnt fit water pressure shower incredible staying foreign countries ive appreciate privacy wall outside feel bit closed nice balcony tables hotel found accidentally sanjay front desk friendly helpful

Reviews.Content: enjoyable staff arrived little cash waiting replacement credit card arrive personal check based passport stayed extra day instead local military lodge neat clean 2 queen beds bathrooms clean indoor parking monitored desk added security motorcycle walking distance town village resturants definitely venue trip san diego

Reviews.Title: “Great location. Nice always smiling manager Sanjay.”

Reviews.Content: look enjoyed visiting san diego twice hotel serves town san diego walk relax eat walking distance trolley border manager sanjay discounted sea world tickets nice convenient close mission bay kids bike fishing rods relaxing fishing trip bay hotel rates middle san diego awesome

Reviews.Content: coming western town sometime 2 times found management reproach friendly accomendating smiling fancy nice clean quiet ready sleep located walking easy provide breakfast coffee cereal motor running manager sanjay patel nice look forward seeing smile coming establishment welcomed arrive definitely manager hotel thumbs

Reviews.Title: “Excellent rates, and great area.”
Reviews.Author: bubbly2272
Reviews.Content: stayed western inn 3 times owner hospitable accommodating clean beds bad located town walking distance main street covered parking available hotel accross street western inn double price fancy hotel means value money

Reviews.Title: “value for money”
Reviews.Author: travelbuggyAustralia
Reviews.Content: stayed ast western inn suites 5 nights august 2010 check smooth staff friendly housekeeping cleaned towels refreshed dated condition clean aircon blackout blinds kept late afternoon sun bay walking distance town train downtown short drive shops downsides breakfast included basic parking tight compact hire car difficult park carpark cant imagine hard larger normal size cars internet wired adequately fast upload internet microwave fridge handy stay rates affordable

Reviews.Title: “Nasty!”
Reviews.Author: EMA2010
Reviews.Content: hotel recommended via accommodation board tourist information booth town pictures misleading redeeming feature hotel proximity town parking tight building isnt maintained basic bathrooms dirty smears wall noticed marriott road packed gone shame lovely hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location, Fantastic price!”

Reviews.Content: normal hotel en suite tv free fast wifi twin queen beds air con etc clean tidy staff couldnt helpful tried staff mark time nearby irish bar sat pint guinness cheers mark hotel simple exactly cheap clean friendly located town five minute walk bus trolley tram station eat drink 2 minute walk complaints return san diego definitely stay

Reviews.Content: stayed recommendation family nice location clean attributes outlets lot outlets wasnt vent fan bathroom loud uncomfortable bathroom woke family bathroom night desk chair sit desk brkfst bad coffee lost reservation overall poor stay

Reviews.Content: meet expectations shower safety bar coming tile safety hazard carpet vacuumed smelled moldmildew beds uncomfortable sheets appeared clean comforter flimsy blanket couldnt comment adequate purpose continental breakfast poor menu cereal mini danishes looked stale
